member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.ModifyLockedInstanceException
member.summary: Defines an exception thrown when trying to modify a locked icon instance.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this exception.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorException
member.summary: Provides a abstract definition for an exception in this library.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorException class.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorException class with the specified error message.
member.param: A System.String containing the error message that describes the exception.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorException.#ctor(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorException class with the specified formatted error message.
member.param: A composite format string.
An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorException class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, sets the System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo with information about the exception.
member.param: The System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorAttributes
member.summary: The attributes added when the HTML tag is rendered.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorAttributes.Attributes
member.summary: Gets a list of attributes added when formatting the HTML markup.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorAttributes.AddAttribute(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add an attribute to the set contained within this instance when formatting the HTML markup.
member.param: A System.String representing the attribute name.
A System.String value containing the attribute to be included in the HTML markup.

member.summary: Merges a set of attributes with the current items.
member.param: A list of attribute names and values to be merged into the current set in this instance.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorAttributes.UpdateAttribute(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Update an exiting attribute contained in this instance. If the value exists it will be replaced otherwise it will added to the list.
member.param: A System.String representing the attribute name.
A System.String value containing the attribute to be included in the HTML markup.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorClassAttributes
member.summary: The class attributes added when the HTML tag is rendered.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorClassAttributes.ClassAttributes
member.summary: Gets the set of class attributes used when formatting the HTML tag.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorClassAttributes.AddClassAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Add a custom class attribute to the set contained within this implementation. The key and the value will contain the value of 'item'. Item is the value that will be used when formatting the HTML class attribute.
member.param: A System.String value containing the attribute to be included in the HTML markup.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorClassAttributes.AddClassAttribute(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a custom class attribute to the set contained within this implementation. the key is used for here for lookup and replacement of existing attribute. Item is the value that will be used when formatting the HTML class attribute.
member.param: A System.String value to provide a key to lookup the attribute in this set.
A System.String value containing the attribute to be included in the HTML markup.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorClassAttributes.UpdateClassAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Update an exiting custom class attribute contained in this implementation. The value for item is to lookup the existing attribute. If the value exists it will be replaced otherwise it will added to the list.
member.param: A System.String value containing the attribute to be included in the HTML markup.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorClassAttributes.UpdateClassAttribute(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Update an exiting custom class attribute contained in this implementation. The value for key is used to lookup the existing attribute. If the value exists it will be replaced otherwise it will added to the list.
member.param: A System.String value to provide a key to lookup the attribute in this set.
A System.String value containing the attribute to be included in the HTML markup.

member.summary: Merges a set of class attributes with the current items.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorObject
member.summary: Provides the basic methods for an HTML tag object in this library including basic operations to add custom class attributes.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorObject.Id
member.summary: Gets/sets the HTML node ID for this object. Read-only if this implementation is locked.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorObject.Name
member.summary: Gets/sets the name of this implementation. This value is for display or managing purposes only and is not used internally by this library. Read-only if this implementation is locked.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorObject.HtmlTag
member.summary: Gets/sets the default HTML parent tag that will be generated from this MVC Razor Object.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorObject.Locked
member.summary: Gets/sets value that indicates of this implementation is locked. Once locked, the implementation cannot be unlocked.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorObject.Html
member.summary: Gets the MvcHtmlString containing the HTML markup of this implementation.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.IMvcRazorObject.IncludeIdInHtml
member.summary: Gets/sets value that determines if the element Id tag is included in the Class Attributes HTL.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.OnGetHtml
member.summary: Gets an MvcHtmlString object containing the HTML markup for this instance. This method must be overridden.
member.returns: A System.Web.Mvc.MvcHtmlString object containing the HTML markup for this object.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.OnInitializeId
member.summary: OnInitializeId

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.OnInitializeName
member.summary: Allows the derived class to initialize the Name without the need to override the name property. The default implementation is to use a HTML Tag and the Id value.
member.returns: A representing the Name for this instance.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.OnInitializeHtmlTag
member.summary: Allows the derived class to initialize the HTML Tag without the need to override the HtmlTag property. The default implementation is to use 'span' as the HtmlTag.
member.returns: A representing the HTML Tag for this instance.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.OnClone
member.summary: Allows the derived class to respond to the Clone() method without the need to override the HtmlTag property.
member.returns: Returns a deep copy of this instance.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.OnGetHtmlStart
member.summary: Creates the HTML TagBuilder object used to create the HTML markup. This step is called first in a series of steps to build the markup.
member.returns: The TagBuilder object used to create the HTML markup.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.OnGetHtmlId(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.TagBuilder)
member.summary: Adds the id attribute to the HTML markup tag. This is the second step in a series of steps to build the markup.
member.param: The TagBuilder object used to create the HTML markup.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.OnGetHtmlClassAttributes(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.TagBuilder)
member.summary: Adds the class attribute to the HTML markup tag. This is the third step in a series of steps to build the markup.
member.param: The TagBuilder object used to create the HTML markup.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.OnGetHtmlAttributes(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.TagBuilder)
member.summary: Adds the tag attribute to the HTML markup tag. This is the fourth step in a series of steps to build the markup.
member.param: The TagBuilder object used to create the HTML markup.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.OnGetHtmlStyles(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.TagBuilder)
member.summary: Adds the tag attribute to the HTML markup tag. This is the fifth step in a series of steps to build the markup.
member.param: The TagBuilder object used to create the HTML markup.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.OnGetInnerHtml(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.TagBuilder)
member.summary: Called to get inner HTML markup. This is the sixth step in a series of steps to build the markup.
member.param: The TagBuilder object used to create the HTML markup.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.OnGetHtmlStartComplete(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.TagBuilder)
member.summary: Called to add any final attributes to the HTML markup tag. This is the seventh and final step in a series of steps to build the markup.
member.param: The TagBuilder object used to create the HTML markup.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.MvcRazorObject.WriteTo(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Text.Encodings.Web.HtmlEncoder)
member.summary: Writes the content by encoding it with the specified encoder to the specified writer.
member.param: The to which the content is written.
The which encodes the content to be written.
